targets.queryText:
resource.type="k8s_container" AND
resource.labels.cluster_name="big" AND
resource.labels.namespace_name="coder-big" AND
resource.labels.location="us-central1-a" AND
resource.labels.project_id="v2-loadtest" AND
(resource.labels.container_name="coder" OR resource.labels.container_name="coder-provisionerd") AND
jsonPayload.message!="" AND
severity="ERROR"

resource.type="k8s_container" AND
resource.labels.cluster_name="big" AND
resource.labels.namespace_name="coder-big" AND
resource.labels.location="us-central1-a" AND
resource.labels.project_id="v2-loadtest" AND
textPayload=~"panic:.*"

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, query) (rate(coderd_db_query_latencies_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, path) (rate(coderd_api_request_latencies_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", path=~"^/api/v2/.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum by(method, path) (rate(coderd_api_request_latencies_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", path=~"^/api/v2/.*"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, action) (rate(coderd_scaletest_dashboard_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))
